item.title: Entering Swindon Close, 23rd July
item.description:
When you enter or exit Swindon Close, the link between the main road and Swindon Close is totally broken. It’s absolutely dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-11;12a;14-16, Swindon Close, St Peter's, Cheltenham

As above

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Is this vehicle abandoned?, 22nd July
item.description:
The vehicle has been here for a couple of weeks. It maybe untaxed and have no MOT but hasn’t been SORNed. There are a number of elderly people nearby that now have at least one less parking space for their convenience.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairhaven Avenue, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New road markings causing a safety hazard, 22nd July
item.description:
New Road markings have been added to the road as part of the new parking scheme. This has resulted in creating a dangerous bottle neck, obscuring visibility on cars turning in / out of side roads. I witness a number of near misses yesterday. These changes are dangerous to road users and need to be reversed immediately.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 141, Hewlett Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red button light on pelican crossing not working, 21st July
item.description:
The light to indicate the pedestrian button has been pressed has not been working on the north west side for a year or so. I appreciate that this does not stop the lights from changing, however, since this is heavily used by local primary school, it would be helpful if this was working correctly to help teach the children road safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Sheldons Court, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signage for primary school facing wrong way, 21st July
item.description:
This sign has been pointing in the wrong direction for years now. (I have reported this before.)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairview Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas mains hole outside 20 All Saints Road, 21st July
item.description:
This has been an extremely hazardous issue for several months. The hole has occasionally been closed but has been largely left open.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, All Saints' Road, Cleevemount, Cheltenham

Storm drain in road outside number 9 I think is blocked up completely in Hatherley Court Rd. For along time from the looks of it!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairhaven Avenue, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Traffic Lights blocked by foliage, 20th July
item.description:
Approaching these lights Eastbound on the A40 coming from Cheltenham they can’t be seen till too late due to overgrown foliage, particularly the set on the right. This presents a severe risk due to potential for late braking when lights can finally be seen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Open drain onto footway, slip risk, 20th July
item.description:
This drainpipe opens out directly onto a pathway, it's a slip hazard in wet or icy weather and might need a gully installation. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Victoria Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Persistent fly-tipping and littering/ cigarette butts discarded, 20th July
item.description:
The residents of this house keep leaving bulk waste items on the street, as well as throwing cigarette butts into the road that then get caught in the water flowing down the road during rainy periods, littering the whole street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Russell Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Significant drainage issue with gully over footway, 20th July
item.description:
Albert House on Charles Street is suffering from extreme foundational damp that's causing long-term damage - it really needs a site visit and the pipes through the gully are getting blocked with water. There are two narrow drains that are missing metal covers and they've been tarmacked over. In the photo I've added the tarmac has collapsed and blocked the drain entirely so no water can escape out into the roadway to drain away. Could you call Steve Ayres on 07917044454 to discuss the situation please? He's a property manager and has been trying to resolve this for ages. Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Charles Street, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely loud manhole covers, 20th July
item.description:
Two man hole covers that are extremely loud every time a car drives over. Keeps me awake awake at night, as it is so loud.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24;26, Libertus Road, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Travellers, 20th July
item.description:
Travellers have started turning up next to the kids play area. As scruffy as Cheltenham looks already this makes it look worse and we all know that they will make noise and leave a mess. Right on top of the school holidays. It means that many people will stop using the park and will stop walking their dogs in that area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Gristmill Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Elmfield Road, St Peter's, Cheltenham
